sec.p: A subset of 205 samples was further analyzed for sex-specific differentiation at the poly-Q locus. GLM analysis performed in STATISTICA yielded no significant differences between geographical regions ( P = 0.54) nor any interaction of population x gender ( Table S4). Forty-two pied flycatcher individuals from the Spanish nest box population were tested for a correlation between laying dates (males were assigned the laying date of their mated female) and poly-Q genotype variation. We did not find any association of the two parameters for either females ( N = 26; r = âˆ’0.022) or males ( N = 16; r = 0.051).
